trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Vincennes
There were no other sightings in Vincennes on or around April 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 11 pm on April 3, 2010 I stepped outside to get some air, and I looked to the south and noticed a orange orb like light near the horizon. I ran inside and grabbed my cell phone and the digital camera, and came back outside, and saw that it was gone. So I waited for about 3 minutes, and it reappeared to the south-southwest as an orange orb, then it disappeared again, but just shortly after, reappeared, this time much closer. I watched it get closer, less than a mile now, as the orange light dimmed and I started to see three white lights in a small triangular formation with a red blinking light in the center, when it was directly over me, I could just barely make out an actual shape to the object (triangle), and this time, I could actually hear a low decible humming sound, though very faint, when the object started to move away from me in a northerly direction, I did not notice any other lights on it, none on the rear, I attempted to take a picture, but it did not show up. I got on my cell phone and called 911 and let them know that a strange light in the sky was headed towards Vincennes.
